name: any2pdf.js
description: This library contains functionality which can help convert documents to PDF using javascript on the browser. This utility is beneficial especially in cases where PDF conversion is a hassle to handle on the server, the server is taking a huge load converting thousands of documents to PDFs in a short time, or handling the conversion of documents on instances where PDF conversion is not a straightforward thing to do (eg: mobile devices).
author: Shamal Perera, Krishnakripa Jayakumar, Malshani Nanayakkara
